name: MakeItALyre's
0:
”Alexa, open Make it a Lyre’s”
”Alexa, ask Make It a Lyre’s how to make a negroni”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make it a lyre's
des:
The first ever Alexa skill featuring nonalcoholic cocktail recipes created with the most awarded nonalcoholic spirits in the world. Every Lyre’s spirit looks, tastes and sashays around the palate just like the original and it best comes to life when mixed into your favorite drink (instead of sipped neat). Our very own Alexa skill will help you make the finest nonalcoholic cocktails at home , providing you with recipes that consist of Lyre’s products in their best proportions as well as the right measurements of mixers, garnishes and syrups to deliver the closest possible match to a mixed original – all minus the alcohol (with fewer calories too). Our skill also provides you with the convenience of adding our products to your Amazon cart through voice activated purchasing. Let's Make It a Lyre's today simply by asking "Alexa, Show Me How To Make A Cocktail Without Alcohol".
This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
